review_title: Great place to work for in climate tech
job_title: Senior Data Scientist in London, England
pros: The company has a amazing atmosphere with smart, friendly people and thoughtful leadership. The opportunities for growth, learning and contributions are abundant. Despite operating in a crowded space, TransitionZero is making a difference with quality work. The amount of work that goes into each project is impressive, and the professionalism of the team is evident.
cons: Honestly, there are not many cons to working at TransitionZero. If I had to come up with one, it would be that, as a relatively young non-profit, some of the processes are still being established. However, this is something that the company is actively working on and improving.

pros: Inclusive and welcoming environment. Culture centred on personal and professional development. A lot of processes in place for regular feedback. Training opportunities, including annual budget and leave.
cons: Small not-for-profit, so we can sometimes be limited in how quickly we move and make decisions.

pros: Friendly staff, very flexible & v. interesting work.
cons: Small so have to do non data science stuff a lot.
